activities.name: Copy data from orders1 to sinkorders1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select orderid,name,	
lastname,inserttime from orders1 where
 inserttime>'@{activity('LookupForMaximumInsertionTym').output.firstRow.date}'
select max(LastModifiedDate) as newUpdatedDate from SourceTable

select * from SourceTable where LastModifiedDate >'@{activity('LKP_PreviousWaterMark').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate}'and LastModifiedDate <='@{activity('LKP_NewWatermark').output.firstRow.newUpdatedDate}'

text.value:
select count(*) as totalresults from @{pipeline().parameters.Schema}.@{pipeline().parameters.tableName} where last_updated >'@{if(empty(pipeline().parameters.backdata),
    activity('LookupForLastTimeStamp').output.value[0].cdc_timestamp,pipeline().parameters.backdata)}'
